name: denim-store
description: MERN Stack Ecommerce Website for Denim Jeans

scripts.dev: set NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.server: set NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.install-all: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.start: set NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd backend && npm start
scripts.start:backend: set NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 && set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd backend && npm start
scripts.fix-ssl: npm cache clean --force && npm run install-all
